arts.ttl: Leeds United moved for £17m attacker in August, he might be free to leave current club
arts.sum: Leeds United tried to sign Jonathan Rowe during the summer window, but he instead left Norwich City for Marseille on a loan-to-buy agreement. An attacking midfielder or winger more favouring the right side was a target for Leeds, including Norwich City’s then star man Jonathan Rowe.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke namechecks Marcelo Bielsa as boss reveals Leeds United aim after Cardiff City romp
arts.sum: Daniel Farke insists his Leeds United squad will "stay humble" after the Championship leaders thrashed Cardiff City 7-0 at Elland Road this afternoon. Farke said: "There will always be criticism; we are Leeds United!
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Leeds United and Cardiff City.

The Bluebirds looked to their bench moments after this chance with Joel Bagan and Yousef Salech introduced for Jesper Daland and El Ghazi. Fellow substitute Mateo Joseph netted a sixth for the home team with two minutes of the 90 remaining, while Piroe scored his second of the afternoon deep in added time.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings vs Cardiff City as Firpo, James and Piroe sparkle
arts.sum: Daniel James left the pitch having bagged a goal and two assists, having been one of United's most active attacking threats all afternoon. Wilfried Gnonto got in on the act with a goal just moments after coming on in the second half before Firpo got another assist for Mateo Joseph's first goal since October.

arts.ttl: Seven-goal Leeds crush Cardiff to show off their title credentials
arts.sum: The visitors had no answer to their rampant hosts.

City overcame tough opposition at home to secure their continued place in the Premier League Cup on Saturday afternoon, with second half substitutes proving influential in Leckwith. Having a good showing throughout the opening 45 minutes, the pair were withdrawn at the break for Luke Pearce and Troy Perrett, who stepped in ably for the young Bluebirds as they sought another equaliser, following Everton’s second of the afternoon.

arts.ttl: Cameron Archer's Southampton absence vs Ipswich Town explained amid Leeds United transfer interest
arts.sum: Leeds United transfer target Cameron Archer is not involved in Southampton's Premier League clash at Ipswich Town today. “I think Cameron is a very good player and a great guy," said Juric.

arts.ttl: Leeds United team news vs Cardiff City as Junior Firpo starts amid Pascal Struijk decision
arts.sum: Daniel Farke has left Pascal Struijk out of his Leeds United line-up for this afternoon's Championship clash with Cardiff City - but Junior Firpo has been handed a first team recall Illan Meslier has started every league game and continues his streak in goal today, while the in-form Jayden Bogle is in undroppable from at right-back.

arts.ttl: Leeds United v Cardiff City Live: Kick-off time, team news and score updates
arts.sum: The Bluebirds travel to Elland Road unbeaten in nine games in all competitions
